segments.text: Hey, y'know what, if you're gonna do that, if you're gonna name him Joey, you should name him Chandler.
segments.speaker: Chandler

segments.text: Chandler's funny, sophisticated, and he's very loveable, once you get to know him.
segments.speaker: Chandler

segments.text: Oh well, hey, Joey's loveable too! But the thing about Joey is, if you need him, he'll be there.
segments.speaker: Joey

segments.text: Well, Chandler will be there for you too.
segments.speaker: Chandler

segments.text: I mean, well, he might be a little late, but-but, he'll be there.
segments.speaker: Chandler

segments.text: And he'll bring you some cold soda, if want you need him for is that you're really hot.
segments.speaker: Chandler

segments.text: What do ya say? What do ya say?
segments.speaker: Joey

segments.text: Well, I, I like the idea of naming him after someone I love, and Joey and Chandler are great names.
segments.speaker: Phoebe

segments.text: But, all right, I don'tâ€”maybe I'll just name him The Hulk.
segments.speaker: Phoebe

segments.text: I knew I shouldn't have mentioned it! That's what I wanted to name my kid!
segments.speaker: Joey
